path: artifacts/NordLoan Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.ZRXToken: contracts/NordLoan Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/ZRXToken

findings.title: Failing low-level call
findings.description: Performing low-level operation over NFT contract involved for approving contract address itself as the spender of NFT Id, which it is already an owner of, and transferring NFT Id from the contract address to the recipient.

findings.title: Missing return value checks for ERC20 transfer operations
findings.description: The functions ignore the return value for ERC20 transfer operations, which can lead to unintended behavior with certain token implementations.

findings.title: Multiple pragma directives have been used
findings.description: Contracts should be deployed using the same compiler version/flags with which they have been tested.

findings.title: Comparison with boolean constants
findings.description: Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false.

findings.title: Unnecessary use of contract address to generate function signature
findings.description: The function signature can be directly generated by the interface itself.
